text: Mobile App and Website providing top quality educational Courses and Workshops. Available of the iOS App Store and Google Play Store.
2019 Masters project investigating GANs (Generative Adversarial Networks), a type of Neural Network architecture, to generate convincing novel content such as Music, Images, and Text
React and React Native developer for Proodle Solutions, a startup located in Nottingham. Working with a Team on developing a University branded application for both mobile and web platform.
Personal project to speed up startup development of signup/login pages using Django and React
